name: Brazilian Virgin Deep Wave/Curly
description:
Brazilian Virgin Deep Wave/Curly

Brazilian Hair Description:

The quality of this hair is Soft, Silky and Smooth and can be treated as if it is your own hair, it can be washed, cut, straightened, dyed, shampooed, conditioned, blow dryed, moisturized, curled and styled as desired to create a completely undetectable, natural, comfortable and stylish look within minutes. The hair is soft with a natural shine to it. With good maintenance, the hair can be used several times over and over again, lasting up to 1 year!

Virgin Hair Texture: Loose Wave

Color: #1B Natural

Item Type: 100 % Virgin Unprocessed Hair Weaving

DESCRIPTION

Weight: 100 grams per Bundle of Hair.( 3.5 ounces)

Quality: Strict quality management and supervision system Color: Natural color #1b (this is the natural color without processing, can be dyed by yourself.).

Texture: - Soft & Luxurious - Natural Looking - Light weight, very comfortable. - Little to Minimal Shedding (even your own natural hair sheds)

Hair is Versatile - retains its style & wave after every wash. - Can dye, flat iron for style for desired look. -

Tangle free - follow washing instructions & it will be tangle FREE.

*HAIR STARTS AT $99!!*

name: About Me/Mission Statement
description:
My name is Dana Pérez and I am a size 14 fashion connoisseur. I began my store to facilitate a move out of my mom’s house January 2011. I have a passion for Fashion, Interior Design and Architecture. My mission is to use all of my recourses and great researching abilities to make this site a means to NEW and USED affordable eccentric items that you cannot find yourself.

The name “Pura Belleza” (Pure Beauty) suggests a pristine collection of contemporary and vintage - style jewelry, bags, clothing and heels selected to make you look unique and on-trend!

I am very passionate about what I do;   having years of experience and dedication, I understand my customer's wants and I am sensitive to the needs of my clients.  I am savvy and cutting edge with all hair textures as well as being knowledgeable and on trend with the latest techniques. 

Become a registered Gossip Girl, it has numerous perks! You will receive Hair Wiz Newsletters via email which includes Promotions, Free Product give-a-ways  and style Updates. You are also always welcome to use my  online booking system http://www.thehairwiz.genbook.com/ to reserve your next appointment.

(Register to be a  Gossip Girl in the side bar to the right.)

PS: LOVE The Hair Wiz? Then don’t forget to follow me on Instagram @thehairwiz. Or find me on Facebook (Dana Rochelle Perez) for Hair, Make-Up and clothing updates!.
